means: 联合，合并( coalesce的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: A mental model begins coalescing in their minds.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个意识模型开始结合到他们的脑子里.

sentence.Network_en: On the basis of coalescing this kind of element can separate oil from compressed air.
sentence.Network_cn: 采用凝聚原理,分离压缩空气中的油份.

sentence.Network_en: The monomer droplets are prevented from coalescing by agitation and the presence of suspension stabilizer.
sentence.Network_cn: 可通过搅拌和加入悬浮稳定剂来阻止单体液滴的聚集.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ... 个时钟周期，幸运的是CUDA提供了 1 种称为合并访问(coalescing)的方式来加速全局存储器的读写。

list.abs: coalescer 聚结剂coalescing fan 接合冲积扇coalescing section 聚结段
salt cake 芒硝salt coalescer 盐凝聚器salt dissolver 盐溶解器
coal washer 洗煤机coalesced copper 烧结铜-
coalescence of eggs 卵接合coalescent pistil 合生雌蕊coarctate pupa 围蛹

entry.def: If two or more things coalesce, they come together and form a larger group or system.

example.ex: Cities, if unrestricted, tend to coalesce into bigger and bigger conurbations...
example.tran: 如果不加限制，城市往往会联合发展成越来越大的集合城市。

example.ex: His sporting and political interests coalesced admirably in his writing about climbing.
example.tran: 他在写登山的文章中，把自己对体育和政治的兴趣完美地结合了起来。

auth_sentence.content: Dufka says ensuring overall discipline may be complicated by the amalgam of fighters coalescing behind Mr.

auth_sentence.content: Opponents accuse the league of being a xenophobic, regionalist and populist group, coalescing around anti-immigration policies.
auth_sentence.res_content: Opponents accuse the league of being a xenophobic, regionalist and populist group, coalescing around anti-immigration policies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Opponents accuse the league of being a xenophobic, regionalist and populist group, coalescing around anti-immigration policies.

auth_sentence.content: Dense rafts and slicks of pink were coalescing all around the boat for as far as we could see.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dense rafts and slicks of pink were coalescing all around the boat for as far as we could see.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dense rafts and slicks of pink were coalescing all around the boat for as far as we could see.
